fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a target to dox at night.
- Fabricate a dox on a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Doxxing reveals their role and any messages they received that night to every player at the end of the night.
- You automatically dox your attackers, instead of your target for that night.
- Fabricated doxes let you choose any role for that player to be falsely revealed as
- You may only fabricate a dox twice.
- Your role is not revealed upon death.
